details.title: Fuzzy adaptive variable structure guidance with application to space interception
details.abstract: The adaptive variable structure guidance (AVSG) is robust to target maneuvers, but apt to induce unwanted chattering. Fuzzy technique is used to implerrent the AVSG for eliminating chattering, and then a new guidance method called fuzzy AVSG is produced. The fuzzy AVSG is applied to the space interception problem Simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of the new gui dance method.
